thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 09 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Russia says U.S. warned of 'grave repercussions' if Syria attacked

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Russia says U.S. warned of 'grave repercussions' if Syria attacked
text:
UNITED NATIONS, April 9 (Reuters) - Russian U.N. Ambassador Vassily Nebenzia said on Monday that the Moscow has warned the United States of “grave repercussions” if it carries out an attack against Syrian government forces over reports of a deadly chemical weapons attack.
“There was no chemical weapons attack,” Nebenzia told the U.N. Security Council. “Through the relevant channels we already conveyed to the U.S. that armed force under mendacious pretext against Syria – where, at the request of the legitimate government of a country, Russian troops have been deployed - could lead to grave repercussions.”
He also said that investigators with the global chemical weapons watchdog should fly to Syria as early as Tuesday to look into accusations about the attack, offering them protection from Syrian authorities and Russian troops. (Reporting by Michelle Nichols Editing by Alistair Bell)
